name: mapreduce.shuffle.pathcache.max-weight
description: The maximum total weight of entries the cache may contain.

name: dfs.mover.retry.max.attempts
description:
The maximum number of retries before the mover consider the
    move failed.

name: dfs.namenode.path.based.cache.refresh.interval.ms
description:
The amount of milliseconds between subsequent path cache rescans.  Path
    cache rescans are when we calculate which blocks should be cached, and on
    what datanodes.

    By default, this parameter is set to 30 seconds.

name: dfs.blockreport.intervalMsec
description: Determines block reporting interval in milliseconds.

name: ha.health-monitor.connect-retry-interval.ms
description: How often to retry connecting to the service.

name: hadoop.http.authentication.token.validity
description:
Indicates how long (in seconds) an authentication token is valid before it has
    to be renewed.

name: mapreduce.job.cache.limit.max-resources-mb
description:
The maximum size (in MB) a map reduce job is allowed to submit
    for localization via files, libjars, archives, and jobjar command line
    arguments and through the distributed cache. If set to 0 the limit is
    ignored.
